Bart Scott spoke for many when he talked about Ben Roethlisberger during conference championship week. ''The respect we have for Ben Roethlisberger is that we don't look at him as a diva quarterback,'' said Bart Scott . We look at him as a football player. In this league, especially now, quarterbacks are treated pretty much like it's flag football. But he's one that's willing to take the hits and look down the barrel of a gun for his team. Tom Brady , Peyton Manning , Drew Brees , Michael Vick and Philip Rivers are all done for the season. Big Ben Roethlisberger is back in the Super Bowl. He's nothing like Aaron Rodgers . But he usually wins.

Mike Pence may have even forced the NRA's hand on whether or not to score the Senate vote on Elena Kagan . The NRA scored the vote on Sonia Sotomayor , the first time they have scored a vote on a Supreme Court justice, a score that will knock down the grades of usually-reliable Democrats like Harry Reid of Nevada.
